proposal: Ever thought of turning your city exploration into a treasure hunt with real rewards? Imagine blending the thrill of discovery with the tangible value of treasures, right from your phone. With 160 holders on the ETH network, you're already on an adventure. Why not take it further? Our DEX and Lottery tools can add a new layer of excitement, allowing your community to deploy and share in the revenue. Let's make the hunt even more rewarding. 🗺️💎🔍
